ProjectTitle: Intermittent exogenous ketosis: a novel strategy to improve hypoxic  tolerance and adaptation
InitialFeedbackHistory:
18/07/2022
Is there any data stored by or transferred to partners? If so, does this contain personal or other sensitive data? Please also include how your parter(s) manage their part of the data. 
Have you considered using a repository for data preservation and sharing? You can use KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) where you have the option to restrict access to the datasets but your data will get a DOI that you can use in your publication, and the metadata that RDR adds makes the data more findable.
label: good with suggestions
